Macon.Medical Center of Central Georgia, Navic: On February 8th, 2018 it was announced that Navicent Health would merge with healthcare giant Atrium Health. The Medical Center, formerly known as Navicent Health (MCNH), and The Medical Center of Central Georgia (MCCG) is a 637-bed hospital located in Macon, Georgia. MCNH is the second largest hospital in Georgia, behind Grady Memorial Hospital in Atlanta.
